attributes.action: Stop the sale of British weapons to Saudi Arabia.
attributes.additional_details:
Saudi Arabia and Iran have been using the Yemen civil war as a means to fit each other as a proxy war. Both countries have committed serious crimes in this region however Saudi Arabia have been sold British weapons which are being used to kill civilians. As a civilized democracy we cannot allow this to continue.

http://www.belfasttelegraph.co.uk/news/uk/call-to-halt-british-arms-sales-to-saudi-arabia-amid-yemen-conflict-34294235.html

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7VGo92WWeJ4
attributes.background: The Saudi Government is using British made weapons to kill innocent civilians in Yemen. We as a world leader should not be condoning this by continuing to sell weapons to a country that has shown they have no regard to civilian life.
